required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study on Treatment of L-DOPA-Induced Dyskinesia With Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center Clinical Study of Treatment of L-DOPA-Induced Dyskinesia With Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

collaborator.agency: Longhua Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine
Shanghai Municipal Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine
The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
Nanjing Hospital of Chinese Medicine affiliated to Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine
The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multi-center clinical trial was conducted to observe the improvement in the level of dyskinesia in patients with Parkinson's disease during the 12-week period of oral treatment with Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine. To observe the differences of the safety and effectiveness between Tianqi Pingchan Granule combined with amantadine and placebo combined with amantadine.

primary_outcome.description: The change from baseline to day 84 of treatment in the sum of the items comprising the Unified Dyskinesia Rating Scale (UDysRS). The UDysRS is administered to assess dyskinesia. The scoring range is 0-104, where higher score means more dyskinesia.

secondary_outcome.description: Change in daily "OFF"-time as assessed with patient diaries from run-in to day 84. This is a self administered diary where patients assess their motor state every half hour during 24 hours.

Change in Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (MDS-UPDRS) total score of part III from Baseline (Day 1) to day 84. The part III of the MDS-UPDRS assess motor function in best on phase. The score range is 0-132, where a higher score means more severe motor impairment.
Change score is an ordinal measure of change with a range of 0 (not assessed) to 7 (very much worse). A score of 4 is associated with "no change

arm_group.arm_group_label: Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine

intervention.intervention_name: Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine
intervention.description: Tianqi Pingchan Granule and Amantadine are given to patients simultaneously
intervention.arm_group_label: Tianqi Pingchan Granule Combined With Amantadine

intervention.description: Placebo and Amantadine are given to patients simultaneously

facility.name: Xinhua Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
